  • Constructor Details

      public NotificationController()

  • Method Details

    • addNotification

      @PostMapping(path="/{userId}/{eventId}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> addNotification(@RequestBody ajbc.doodle.calendar.entities.Notification notification, @PathVariable Integer userId, @PathVariable Integer eventId)
      This method creates an notification for a event assigned to user. In case a event for a user does not exist an error will sent no such event exist.
      Parameters:
      notification - the body of the notification to add.
      userId - the user to receive the notification.
      eventId - the event for the notification to alert.
      Returns:
      the notification added to the DB, in case of failure a custom error message.
      Throws:
      ajbc.doodle.calendar.daos.DaoException

    • addListOfNotifications

      @PostMapping public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> addListOfNotifications(@RequestBody List<ajbc.doodle.calendar.entities.Notification> notifications)
      This method adds a list of notification with events assigned to user. In case a event for a user does not exist an error will sent no such event exist.
      Parameters:
      notifications - the list to add the DB.
      Returns:
      the list of notifications added in case of success, in case of failure a custom error message.

    • isSubscribed

      @PostMapping("/isSubscribed") public boolean isSubscribed(@RequestBody ajbc.doodle.calendar.entities.webpush.SubscriptionEndpoint subscription)
      This method is used the check whether exist an subscription for user.
      Parameters:
      subscription - information to the server
      Returns:
      true in case subscribed, false if not.

    • publicSigningKey

      @GetMapping(path="/publicSigningKey", produces="application/octet-stream") public byte[] publicSigningKey()
      This method provides a GET endpoint that returns the public key, To pass the public key from the server to the JavaScript application.
      Returns:
      public key.

    • getAllNotifications

      @GetMapping public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> getAllNotifications()
      This method returns all notifications in the DB.
      Returns:
      list of notifications, in case of failure a custom error message.

    • getNotificationById

      @GetMapping(path="/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> getNotificationById(@PathVariable Integer id)
      This method returns a notification by its id from the DB.
      Parameters:
      id - notification required.
      Returns:
      the desired notification, in case of failure a custom error message.

    • getNotificationByEvent

      @GetMapping(path="/event/{eventId}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> getNotificationByEvent(@PathVariable Integer eventId)
      This method returns list of notifications by event id.
      Parameters:
      eventId - the event to required.
      Returns:
      list of notifications, in case of failure a custom error message.

    • updateNotification

      @PutMapping(path="/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> updateNotification(@RequestBody ajbc.doodle.calendar.entities.Notification notification, @PathVariable Integer id)
      This method updates notification by id.
      Parameters:
      notification - the body of the notification to update.
      id - the notification id to update.
      Returns:
      the updated notification, in case of failure a custom error message.

    • updateNotifications

      @PutMapping public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> updateNotifications(@RequestBody List<ajbc.doodle.calendar.entities.Notification> notifications)
      This method updates a list of notification.
      Parameters:
      notifications - the notifications required to update.
      Returns:
      the list of the updated notifications, in case of failure a custom error message.

    • deleteNotification

      @DeleteMapping(path="/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> deleteNotification(@RequestParam Map<String,String> map, @PathVariable Integer id)
      This method deletes an notification by 2 options: 1. soft delete 2. hard delete. soft delete - set a flag for this notification. hard delete - erase the notification from the DB.
      Parameters:
      map - contains key and value of the required method type to delete.
      id - is the notification id required to delete.
      Returns:
      the deleted notification is case of success, or a costume message error in case of failure.

    • deleteListNotificatioins

      @DeleteMapping public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> deleteListNotificatioins(@RequestParam Map<String,String> map, @RequestBody List<ajbc.doodle.calendar.entities.Notification> notifications)
      This method deletes List of notifications by 2 options: 1. soft delete 2. hard delete. soft delete - set a flag for the notifications. hard delete - erase the notifications from the DB.
      Parameters:
      map - contains key and value of the required method type to delete.
      events - is the list of notifications required to delete.
      Returns:
      the deleted notifications is case of success, or a costume message error in case of failure.
